name: Coloring Game (itch)
description:
***Coloring Game is a coloring application, an easy to use, fun and creative powerful app for children for 1 years and up***

- Coloring Game For kids game is not designed only for your 2-8 years old son but your daughter as well. Color the coloring pages of christmas on your phone or tablet in this virtual coloring and painting book. It so easy that even toddler can play. This app coloring game is a kids game where children can color the christmas and winter coloring pages, but they can also draw their own drawing . Both, boys and girls will love this coloring book game for kids. In this coloring game you can find reindeer, magic cookies, candies, santa claus and a lot of christmas decoration.

- An app can be used at the playschool, preschool, for fun as an educational drawing game. For girls we have Princesses Mermaids, hearts, dresses and flowers we prepared. Coloring book for boys are diggers, vehicles , dinosaurs and blank page doodling. The biggest attraction though is colouring animals, that make real sounds!

****How to play****
- Navigate through all available animated coloring books. Pick one to begin coloring, including:

- Alphabet Book: Contains all Alphabets A.b.c......
- Animal Book: Contains some Animal: Monkey, Crocodile, elephant..............
- Shapes Book: Contains some sketch of shapes like triangle,square.......
- Chrismas Book: Contains some sketch of Chrismas like gifts, chrismas tree, Santa Claus........
- Cartoon Book: Contains some sketch of characters like mickey mouse, spider man......
- Boys Book: Contains some sketch for boys like Cars, foot-ball ...............
- Transport Book: Contains some sketch: chuggington trains, cars..........
- Girls Book: Contains some sketch: for girls like dresses,mermaid, princesses like cindrella, aurora ...........
- Summer Book: Contains some sketch of summer like sunshine, sea.......

- Features:
100+ pictures of various kinds.
- various brushes, including dry brush, water-color, crayon, pen, rainbow, glow neon.
- easy color picker
- pinch to zoom in/out to paint in small space
- ink dropper
- "movie" mode to replay the coloring like a small film.
- show or hide menu by tapping the right-bottom button
- built-in gallery to store both coloring picture and coloring animation.
- undo/redo
- Suitable for both smart phones and tablets.
- Provides flawless coloring experience for every single detail.

- Enjoy!

For any comments or suggestions, please send an e-mail. Thanks!.
